Title: Must Be... Love
Writer: Melissa Mae Chua (story), Roumella Monge (story), Vanessa R. Valdez (story), Melissa Mae Chua (screenplay), Roumella Monge (screenplay)
Actors: Kathryn Bernardo, Daniel Padilla, Liza Soberano, John Estrada
Plot: Patricia, a tomboyish teenage girl who fell in love with her childhood best friend, Ivan. But Ivan sees her only as his best friend, and he fell in love with Patricia's cousin, Angel. ...
